entheogens.name: Mescaline
entheogens.form: peyote buttons or isolated compound in powder form
entheogens.locations: in the southwest to mid-western territories of North America primarily

entheogens.name: LSD
entheogens.form: synthesised crystals which are commonly deluded into liquid and then dropped on paper squares or gel tabs
entheogens.dosage: between 50 - 150 ug per dose, and multiple simultaneous doses from 1 to 10 is common at once

entheogens.name: DMT
entheogens.dosage: anywhere between 2 - 60mg depending upon desired effect
entheogens.locations: in the Amazon Rainforest in the form of Ayahuasca, while the isolated compound is now available world wide in underground markets

entheogens.name: 2C-B
entheogens.locations: primarily in metropolitan areas world wide
